reviewText: Although at first glance the game may seem like your standard Breakout clone, the mechanics of switching colors and collecting power-ups add an extra element of chaos to the game. There's something satisfying about firing off multiple spiked balls at once and watching them tear through the waves of viruses. The NES-style music and deliberately silly story are a nice touch as well. It's a little on the simplistic side, but if you're in the mood for a puzzle game I'd say it's well worth its price.
